search.query:
| inputlookup df_firedrill_results.csv | eval start_time=relative_time(now(), "@d") | eval end_time=relative_time(now(), "+d@d") | where ResultTime>=start_time AND ResultTime < end_time
| inputlookup df_firedrill_scenario_to_notable_rule.csv append=true
| stats last(ResultTime) as ResultTime, last(OutcomeName) as OutcomeName, last(ResultID) as ResultID, last(ScenarioName) as ScenarioName, values(RuleName) as rule_name, values(src_ip) as src_ip by ScenarioID
| mvexpand rule_name | mvexpand src_ip
| JOIN type=LEFT rule_name,src_ip [ search `notable` | makemv delim=" " dest_ip | makemv delim=" " src_ip | eval src_ip=mvdedup(mvappend(src_ip,dest_ip)) | mvexpand src_ip | rename _time AS NotableTime | eval NotableFound=1 | table NotableTime src_ip rule_name NotableFound ]
| eval TimeToNotable=round((NotableTime-ResultTime)/60,0) | stats values(OutcomeName) as OutcomeName, avg(TimeToNotable) as TimeToNotable, sum(NotableFound) as NotablesFound count as NotablesExpected by ScenarioName,rule_name | fillnull value=0 NotablesFound | eval NotableCoverage=round(100*NotablesFound/NotablesExpected,0) | eval TimeToNotable=round(TimeToNotable,0) | rename rule_name as RuleName | fields ScenarioName RuleName NotableCoverage | chart avg(NotableCoverage) as NotableCoverage over ScenarioName by RuleName

| inputlookup df_firedrill_results.csv | eval start_time=relative_time(now(), "@d") | eval end_time=relative_time(now(), "+d@d") | where ResultTime>=start_time AND ResultTime < end_time | inputlookup df_firedrill_scenario_to_notable_rule.csv append=true | stats first(ResultTime) as FirstResultTime, last(ResultTime) as LastResultTime, last(OutcomeName) as OutcomeName, last(ResultID) as ResultID, last(ScenarioName) as ScenarioName, values(RuleName) as rule_name, values(src_ip) as src_ip by ScenarioID | mvexpand rule_name | mvexpand src_ip | JOIN type=LEFT rule_name,src_ip [ search `notable` | makemv delim=" " dest_ip | makemv delim=" " src_ip | eval src_ip=mvdedup(mvappend(src_ip,dest_ip)) | mvexpand src_ip | rename _time AS NotableTime | eval NotableFound=1 | table NotableTime src_ip rule_name NotableFound ] | eval TimeToFirstNotable=round((NotableTime-FirstResultTime)/60,0) | eval TimeToLastNotable=round((NotableTime-LastResultTime)/60,0) | stats values(OutcomeName) as OutcomeName, avg(TimeToFirstNotable) as TimeToFirstNotable, avg(TimeToLastNotable) as TimeToLastNotable, sum(NotableFound) as NotablesFound count as NotablesExpected by ScenarioName,rule_name | fillnull value=0 NotablesFound | eval NotableCoverage=round(100*NotablesFound/NotablesExpected,0) | eval TimeToFirstNotable=round(TimeToFirstNotable,0) | eval TimeToLastNotable=round(TimeToLastNotable,0) | rename rule_name as RuleName | fields ScenarioName RuleName TimeToFirstNotable TimeToLastNotable | chart avg(TimeToFirstNotable) as TimeToFirstNotable, avg(TimeToLastNotable) as TimeToLastNotable over ScenarioName by RuleName
